title: Test ForensiDoc

values.title: Text for professional statement goes here
values.value: Text for professional statement goes here

fields.title: Report Identification Reference
fields.allowed_characters_error_message: Only alphanumeric characters _ and - are allowed!

values.title: A9 - Any other Asian ethnic background
values.value: A9 - Any other Asian ethnic background

values.title: B9 - Any other Black ethnic background
values.value: B9 - Any other Black ethnic background

values.title: W9 - Any other White ethnic background
values.value: W9 - Any other White ethnic background

values.title: Congo, The Democratic Republic of The
values.value: Congo, The Democratic Republic of The

values.title: Macedonia, The Former Yugoslav Republic of
values.value: Macedonia, The Former Yugoslav Republic of

values.title: South Georgia and The South Sandwich Islands
values.value: South Georgia and The South Sandwich Islands

fields.title: Question 1
fields.display_label: What is the year? Season? Date? Day of the week? Month?

fields.title: Question 2
fields.display_label: Where are we now: State? County? Town/city? Hospital? Floor?

fields.title: Question 3
fields.display_label: Name three unrelated objects clearly and slowly, then ask the patient to name all three of them.

fields.title: Question 4
fields.display_label: Count backward from 100 by sevens.

fields.title: Question 5
fields.display_label: Earlier I told you the names of three things. Can you tell me what those were?

fields.title: Question 6
fields.display_label: Show the patient two simple objects, such as a wristwatch and a pencil, and ask the patient to name them.

fields.title: Question 7
fields.display_label: Repeat the phrase: No ifs, ands, or buts.

fields.title: Question 8
fields.display_label: Take the paper in your right hand, fold it in half, and put it on the floor. (The examiner gives the patient a piece of blank paper.)

fields.title: Question 9
fields.display_label: Please read this and do what it says. (Written instruction is Close your eyes.)

fields.title: Question 10
fields.display_label: Make up and write a sentence about anything. (This sentence must contain a noun and a verb.)

fields.title: Question 11
fields.display_label: Please copy this picture. (The examiner gives the patient a blank piece of paper and asks him/her to draw the symbol below. All 10 angles must be present and two must intersect.)

fields.title: MMSE Coma Score Result
fields.formula: function() { var totalScore = {mmse_question_1}+{mmse_question_2}+{mmse_question_3}+{mmse_question_4}+{mmse_question_5}+{mmse_question_6}+{mmse_question_7}+{mmse_question_8}+{mmse_question_9}+{mmse_question_10}+{mmse_question_11}; var severityDisplay = ''; if (totalScore >= 0 && totalScore <= 17) { severityDisplay = '(Severe Cognitive Impairment)'; } else if (totalScore >= 18 && totalScore <= 23) { severityDisplay = '(Mild Cognitive Impairment)'; } else if (totalScore >= 24) { severityDisplay = '(No Cognitive Impairment)'; } return ''.concat(totalScore.toString(),' ',severityDisplay); }

fields.title: Resting Pulse Rate
fields.display_label: (record beats per minute) Measured after patient is sitting or lying for one minute

fields.title: Sweating
fields.display_label: over past  hour not accounted for by room temperature or patient activity

values.title: no report of chills or flushing
subjective report of chills or flushing
flushed or observable moistness on face
beads of sweat on brow or face

fields.title: Restlessness
fields.display_label: Observation during assessment

values.title: reports difficulty sitting still, but is able to do so
frequent shifting or extraneous movements of legs/arms
Unable to sit still for more than a few seconds
pupils pinned or normal size for room light
pupils possibly larger than normal for room light
pupils so dilated that only the rim of the iris is visible

fields.title: Bone or Joint aches
fields.display_label: If patient was having pain previously, only the additional component attributed to opiates withdrawal is scored

values.title: patient reports severe diffuse aching of joints/ muscles
patient is rubbing joints or muscles and is unable to sit still because of discomfort

fields.title: Runny nose or tearing
fields.display_label: Not accounted for by cold symptoms or allergies

values.title: nasal stuffiness or unusually moist eyes
nose constantly running or tears streaming down cheeks

fields.title: GI Upset
fields.display_label: over last  hour

values.title: Multiple episodes of diarrhea or vomiting

fields.title: Tremor
fields.display_label: observation of outstretched hands

values.title: tremor can be felt, but not observed

fields.title: Yawning
fields.display_label: Observation during assessment

values.title: yawning once or twice during assessment
yawning three or more times during assessment
patient reports increasing irritability or anxiousness
patient so irritable or anxious that participation in the assessment is difficult
piloerrection of skin can be felt or hairs standing up on arms

fields.title: COWS Score
fields.formula: function() { var totalScore = {cows_question_1}+{cows_question_2}+{cows_question_3}+{cows_question_4}+{cows_question_5}+{cows_question_6}+{cows_question_7}+{cows_question_8}+{cows_question_9}+{cows_question_10}+{cows_question_11}; var severityDisplay = ''; if (totalScore >= 5 && totalScore <= 12) { severityDisplay = 'mild'; } else if (totalScore >= 13 && totalScore <= 24) { severityDisplay = 'moderate'; } else if (totalScore >= 25 && totalScore <= 36) { severityDisplay = 'moderately severe'; } else if (totalScore > 36) { severityDisplay = 'severe withdrawal'; } return ''.concat(totalScore.toString(),' ',severityDisplay); }

fields.title: Nausea and vomiting
fields.display_label: Do you feel sick to your stomach? Have you vomited?

values.title: constant nausea, frequent dry heaves and vomiting

fields.title: Tactile disturbances
fields.display_label: Have you any itching, pins and needles sensations, any burning, any numbness, or do you feel bugs crawling on or under your skin?

values.title: very mild itching, pins and needles, burning or numbness
mild itching, pins and needles, burning or numbness
moderate itching, pins and needles, burning or numbness

fields.title: Tremor
fields.display_label: Arms extended and fingers spread apart

values.title: not visible, but can be felt fingertip to fingertip
severe, even with arms not extended

fields.title: Auditory disturbances
fields.display_label: Are you more aware of sounds around you? Are they harsh? Do they frighten you? Are you hearing anything that is disturbing to you? Are you hearing things you know are not there?

values.title: very mild harshness or ability to frighten
mild harshness or ability to frighten
moderate harshness or ability to frighten

fields.title: Paroxysmal sweats
fields.display_label: Observation

values.title: beads of sweat obvious on forehead

fields.title: Visual disturbances
fields.display_label: Does the light appear to be too bright? Is its color different? Does it hurt your eyes? Are you seeing anything that is disturbing to you? Are you seeing things you know are not there?

fields.title: Anxiety
fields.display_label: Do you feel nervous?

values.title: moderately anxious, or guarded, so anxiety is inferred
equivalent to acute panic states as seen in severe delirium or acute schizophrenic reactions

fields.title: Headache, fullness in head
fields.display_label: Does your head feel different? Does it feel like there is a band around your head?

fields.title: Agitation
fields.display_label: Observation

values.title: paces back and forth during most of the interview, or constantly thrashes about

fields.title: Orientation and clouding of sensorium
fields.display_label: What day is this? Where are you? Who am I?

values.title: oriented and can do serial additions
cannot do serial additions or is uncertain about date
disoriented for date by no more than 2 calendar days
disoriented for date by more than 2 calendar days
